column1: #text=I begin by making a grocery list of the items I will need to buy at the grocery store .
#text=Some items are staples and pantry items such as milk and eggs and some are things I want like snacks .
#text=I visit my favorite grocery store Trader Joes which is walkable from my house in my neighborhood .
#text=I bring with me my own grocery bags so I can be green and reuse bags for the environment .
#text=I arrive at the store and get a shopping cart to put my groceries in .
#text=I start at the aisle with the vegetables and then dairy and then work my way through all the aisles of the grocery store .
#text=I buy and check off on the items on my grocery list plus more items not on the list of course .
#text=The store always has new seasonal items so I always manage to buy some of those items .
#text=I get on line and pay for my groceries at the cash register .
#text=The cashiers at this store are always so nice with good customer service .
#text=I pay for everything , leave the store , and bring my groceries home to enjoy .
